snippet.title: Keying Animation Updates in Blender 4.1
snippet.description:
Blender 4.1 introduces a new way for inserting animation keyframes, for a simpler and more intuitive workflow.

Read about all changes related to animation and rigging in Blender 4.1: https://developer.blender.org/docs/release_notes/4.1/animation_rigging/#keying 

Blender 4.1 release notes: https://blender.org/download/releases/4-1/ 

Video by Rik Schutte from @BlenderStudio 

Support Blender development at https://fund.blender.org

--
